availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Wilson Winebarger (Webster County, Kentucky, farm laborer.)

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farm laborer. North Carolina native. Married to Evaline Gardner Winebarger in Webster County, Kentucky, on December 12, 1860. Father of Demarcus Winebarger and Lucy A. Winebarger. Farm laborer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 601.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 2, p. 175B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Webster County Marriages, Film #000565876.
"Wilson M. Winebarger (1836-1901)," Find A Grave, Memorial #41060726, accessed July 28, 2022, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/41060726/wilson-m-winebarger.
